flounder.fonts

Class FlounderFonts

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.fonts.FlounderFonts
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IModule

    public class FlounderFonts
extends java.lang.Object
implements IModule
    A class that holds a list of available engine fonts and texts currently on the screen.
